column5: This is a must see..Talk about a great feel good story! The best part is, it was filmed in Port Credit Ontario! Enjoy!, I know I did  <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/y0qZYqdsYAg" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
OK, that one put a tear in my eye.....
One of the best commercials i have ever seen.  Cool  Cheers  Craig
Awesome!!  Port credit was my home ice for years.
I bet it felt like a night in the big leagues...  Must of felt great for those guys...

Same here, played many games there for Mississauga and Cawthra Park and then coached Cooksville minor hockey teams for 5 years. Even played a few years there in a mens league. No other arena in GTA that has as much kharma for me.  I got a chill when I saw "the walk" from the dressing room up the ramps to the bench area. Probably the worst skate sharpening in the whole country though!!

Watching was like being in Ontario championships three times and coming up with gold metal for under21aaa in the GTHL Second one was moving like the video Double over time to win gold packed house Unbelievable hockey

AHHH Port Credit!!! the best ice in the province bar none.  Till this day my favorite arena, still remember those 5:30 am practices growing up, lie it was yesterday.  That is on awesome commercial   Peps
Ya pretty cool,  one of my good buddys was playing that night. I'll get the scoop over beers on the weekend.
That brought a smile to my face. Great stuff.
Awesome!  Just a good old fashion feel good story.
Out of the Blue.. I mean Bring Some Buds!  Very cool stuff. Definitly put a grin on my mug.

There was a story  on CBC or CTV news channel this morning that reported that these players were not told in advance that Budweiser was setting this whole thing up. They let it build gradually during the first and second periods. That's why the players look so shocked.
